theHeart:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theHeart:BloodClots.NAME: Blood Clots Power
DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block each time you exhaust a Status card.

theHeart:Pacemaker.NAME: Pacemaker Power
DESCRIPTION: Look at the first 5 cards in your draw pile, exhaust one card

theHeart:Hemorrhage.NAME: Hemorrhage Power
DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 extra card, add 1 Wound to your draw pile

theHearT:EndlessHatred.NAME: Endless Hatred Power
DESCRIPTION: When a status card exhausts deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theHeart:MyocardialRupturePower.NAME: Myocardial Rupture Power
DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 hp every time you play a card, all cards cost zero, when you play a card exhaust it and add a Wound.

theHeart:NoxiousBloodPower.NAME: Noxious Blood Power
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Apply !M! poison to self and ALL enemies.

theHeart:GrayPlateletsPower.NAME: Gray Platelets Power
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose hp from a card, apply 2 poison to all enemies.

theHeart:CorruptedFormPower.NAME: Corrupted Form Power
DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Wound gain !M! temporary Strength.

theHeart:AdaptiveCellsPower.NAME: Adaptive Cells Power
DESCRIPTION: If you draw a Status gain block, if it exhausts draw 1 card, if it has a negative effect deal damage.

theHeart:Heartbeat.NAME: Heartbeat Power
DESCRIPTION: The next card you play goes back to the top of your draw pile.
